basic.floral_language:
Eichhornia crassipes
Floriography: vigorous, brave, tenacious
Water hyacinth is an aquatic plant. Leaves bright green, nearly round, rolled out in a shape of calla lily buds, has lavender flowers clustered at the top of the stalk above foliage. Water hyacinths grow fast, becoming a serious intruder in waterbodies causing.
Water hyacinths like ample sunlight. Flowering from July to October, available for viewing 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period July-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: 1/3 fertile silt or river sand and 2/3 of water
maintenance.watering: Aquatic plant, keep soil moist high
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
